title: Crushed roast parsnip, potato and apple
ingredients: ['900g (2lbs) parsnips, peeled and chopped into even size pieces', '675g (1 1/2 lbs) old potatoes, peeled and chopped', '2 crisp, tart eating apples, peeled, cored and chopped', '3 tablespoons oil', '50g (2oz) butter', 'Pinch salt and pepper', '2 level tablespoons freshly chopped chives']
